delete from ass_oil_award_apply_info where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT su.name userName, ai.project_name projectName FROM boot_do.ass_award_enterprise_project pro JOIN sys_user su ON pro.create_uid = su.user_id JOIN ass_oil_award_apply_info ai ON ai.pro_id = pro.id WHERE pro.id = #{value} LIMIT 1
